mapper.insert: insert into friend_req values (req_seq.nextval, #{user_email}, #{req_email}, sysdate, 'FR01', sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.REQ_EMAIL , A.USER_EMAIL , C.USER_NM FROM FRIEND_REQ A, USERS C WHERE A.REQ_EMAIL = #{REQ_EMAIL} AND A.USER_EMAIL = C.USER_EMAIL AND C.USER_EMAIL = A.USER_EMAIL AND A.REQ_ST = 'FR01'
select frd_email, u.user_nm from friends f , users u where f.frd_email = u.user_email and f.user_email= #{user_email}
